author: pmouawad
msg: Bug 56811 - "Start Next Thread Loop" in Result Status Action Handler or on Thread Group and "Go to next Loop iteration" in Test Action behave incorrectly with TransactionController that has "Generate Parent Sampler" checked

author: peter_firmstone
msg: Refactor ServiceDiscoveryManager to remove race conditions and random test failures.  A number of tasks have been refactored out to simplify, while some new tasks have been created to allow handing off notification calls into external code via executor threads.
Avoid swallowing InterruptedExceptions, restore thread interrupt.
Remove dead object store, cacheList in servicediscovery tests.
LookupLocator - new protected method for common code with ConstrainableLookupLocator to avoid code duplication.
ServiceItem - implement Cloneable for the benefit of ServiceDiscoveryManager.
Fix ServiceDiscoveryEvent constructor so it isn't susceptible to finalizer attack.

author: pmouawad
msg: Code style based on patch by Graham Russel

author: pmouawad
msg: Code simplificatiion based on patch by Graham Russel
